title: Fire Crab
description: Katie and Ashley talk about quotes you could put on pillows and whether it’s ok to drink wine out of a mason jar. Who will Austin root for when the Eagles play the Steelers next week? Odell is back, the Panthers are undefeated since CMC’s photoshoot, JJ Watt posts an interesting picture, and Philip Rivers mic’d up is gold. Katie has thoughts on the “ratings” conversation, and the Lightning had a Stanley Cup celebration that made no sense. Finally, round two of the MLB Mascot Battle.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and Ashley discuss the important topics like quotes on pillows and drinking wine out of mason jars.
